rows.label: tev015301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev015301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Letrick about this place.

rows.label: tev015301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev015301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Letrick if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev015301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Letrick about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev015301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Letrick about the damage sustained in the attack.

rows.label: tev015301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Letrick about the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev015301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Letrick about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Letrick about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0001
rows.name:
This cathedral is for everyone. All congregants are
welcome, regardless of their ideology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Even Jo from the café in the commercial district comes
here to pray regularly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0003
rows.name:
She always comes to repent for the destruction
she's caused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0004
rows.name:
If only that penitence would lead to some
improvement in her behavior...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hmm. Lately I have become a little concerned about
a young lady named Fraisie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0009
rows.name:
She's been going around and pushing her beliefs on
everyone she encounters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have no desire to challenge her beliefs,
but I don't want her bothering the other congregants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0015
rows.name:
The Ma-non have been asking a number of difficult
questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0016
rows.name:
For example, one of them asked me for data on the
specific effects of prayer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0017
rows.name:
When I explain that I am not able to quantify peace
of mind, he asked to see the schematics for the
mimeosome component that handles peace of mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's just one impossible question after another.
And I'm neither a scientist nor a theologian, so I have
no idea how to answer these sorts of queries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0020
rows.name:
The attack on New LA left deep scars on the hearts
of its residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0021
rows.name:
While our bodies may be strong mimeosomes,
our souls are still frail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even Jo from the Sunshine Café is praying more
fervently than before in the hopes that no more lives
need be lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0030
rows.name:
At long last, returning to our flesh-and-blood bodies
has become a real possibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0031
rows.name:
But there are more than a few people in our
congregation who would prefer not to do so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0032
rows.name:
They're enticed by the possibility of trading a transient
form for eternal life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Even Jo, perhaps our most fervent of congregants,
has been extolling the convenience of having a
repairable body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'm sure everyone has their reasons, but...
Well, even after we finally achieved our goal,
it seems humans can't help but thirst for more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG1001
rows.name:
I never would have guessed that Fraisie was plotting
something so horrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG1002
rows.name:
Don't misunderstand me—sharing one's beliefs and
seeking conformity from others are not sins in and
of themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG1003
rows.name:
But an act of deception at that scale tarnishes the
reputation of this entire church![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG1004
rows.name:
I am truly relieved that you and your Ma-non friend,
Dr. Staccata, were able to stop her before this scandal
escalated into a tragedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG2001
rows.name:
I heard that Fraisie was deceived by a xenoform that
was capable of impersonating humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG2002
rows.name:
Before she landed here on Mira, she was simply an
unusually devout young woman. But perhaps that faith
became her undoing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015301_MSG2003
rows.name:
Once she's had a chance to reflect upon her misdeeds,
I will welcome her back to the church with open arms.[ST:wait ]
